Name: Personalized Wedding Countdown Blocks
Description: These Personalized Wedding Countdown Blocks are professionally cut, sanded, stained/painted, clear coated and then Personalized with the Groom's Last name in the colors you prefer. Design your own set. The Top Block will have a Heart on one side, a Diamond ring on the other side, The second row is for your days of the year, there is enough for all 365, the 3rd row will say, "Days until we're" and the final row will say "Mr. & Mrs. ______" Please remember to leave last name requests. After the wedding you can flip the 2 bottom rows to start counting down till the first anniversary, the blocks will then read "days til our anniversary"

Name: Personalized Skinny Wedding Tumblers
Description: These Skinny Tumblers come with lids and straws. They are Personalized with your girls Names & Wedding Roles in the colors you choose and they are topped with a matching bow. Be sure to leave the Names and Wedding Roles in the text box when you purchase.

Name: Knot Bridesmaid Proposal Card + Earrings + Necklace
Description: These Personalized Tie the Knot Cards make great proposal gifts -OR- Thank You Gifts for your Bridesmaids, Maid of Honor, Jr. Bridesmaids, Matron of Honor, Flower Girls and even the Mother of the Bride and Groom. Each card comes with Knot Earrings and the Matching Knot Necklace. The cards come in Ivory, Blush Pink, Mint Green or Kraft (brown)...You may choose to write your own personalized short message to go on the card or you can choose one of our pre-made phrases in the drop down menu below.

Name: Tie the Knot //Personalized Heart Card + Cuff Bracelet
Description: These adorable Tie the Knot Gift Cards and Cuff Bracelets are perfect Thank You Gifts for the Girls in your wedding party. The cuff bracelets are adjustable, NICKEL FREE and come in 3 different finishes for you to choose from: Silver, Gold or Rose Gold. You can also choose  the color of the heart gift card and personalize them with the name of the person you are gifting them to and sign with your own name. You may choose to stick with one of the pre written messages we have to pick from or you can use the text box below to type out your own SHORT sweet note! I cant wait to personalize these cute little gits for you! :) ** Please leave your name, Email, Name & wedding role for each person you are purchasing a card for. I will need this info in order to process. Check for typos as i will be copy and pasting this info. Make sure you don't forget any info as this will cause a delay in processing your order. I will email you a conformation example picture to make sure you LOVE them before I send them out.

Name: Wooden Wedding Hangers // Personalized with Names
Description: These hangers are a great gift for anyone in your wedding party. They of course will be used to hang Bridesmaid dresses and Tuxedos but they also a great way to display all the outfits in your professions photos while everyone gets ready, then after the wedding they will be used to store their dresses at home in their own closet, Chose the wood finish you prefer: Natural Wood, Dark Stained Wood, or White painted Wood then choose the color of names and i will top with a matching bow. Please use the text box below to leave your name and email, then type out everyone's name. I will be copy and pasting info so be sure to spell check before you send. I will use your email to contact you with any questions while processing your order, so be sure to keep an eye out for emails after you purchase.

Name: Personalized Grandmother Tote Bag
Description: Canvas tote bags designed for Grandmothers or you could gift to any Mother.  These are prefect for Mother’s Day gifts, or even birthday and Christmas gifts.  You personalize with the name you call your grandma/mom then add the kids names to the middle

Description: This wooden sign is 18” x 5.5” with a white washed finished & Personalized with last name and wedding date.

Name: Personalized Makeup Bags
Description: These makeup bags are 8” x 5” and personalized with a name in the color of your choice. Choose from a white bag or black.

Name: Personalized Bridesmaids Hangers (Wedding Role - Name -Date
Description: Dress up your wedding day with these beautiful engraved hangers then gift them to your Bridal party to take home as a memorabilia. Great for bridal gown, bridesmaid/maid of honor dresses, mother of the bride/groom dress, jr. bridesmaid, sister of the bride/groom, or even groom and groomsmen. Each hanger is personalized with Wedding Role to the Left, Name in the center top & Wedding date to the Right in the color you choose then topped with a matching bow. If you choose not to have some of these options on your hangers, please note this in the text box provided for personalization. Place bridesmaid hangers with the bridal wedding dress for an unforgettable picture. ➼ ITEM DETAILS High quality Wooden Hanger with Swivel Hook (choose wood finish in dropdown menu) Hanger Size: 17 1/2 x 6 1/2 x 1/2 ♥ STORE POLICIES ~ Please verify all information before ordering. We assume initials are given as requested above and item will be personalized with information given. NO refunds or exchanges will be given unless there is a gross error on our part. Please message us with any questions about this before ordering. ~ If ALL information is not given when ordered, there will be a delay in processing the order. ~ While we attempt to represent all colors accurately, there can be a slight variation in colors due to individual screen resolution. ♥ SHIPPING > See Shop Announcement for up to date turnaround times, as this can vary especially during holiday times. > All orders are shipped using USPS Priority (1-3 days)  Shipping times are in addition to turnaround time. > Each order will have a tracking number once shipped. ♥♥ We want you to love the item you receive ~ If you have any questions or concerns, please message us! ♥♥

Name: Design & Customize a Keychain

Choose one color & one font from our options (shown in example photos) then ADD PERSONALIZATIONS in the text box. Lettering is personalized with permanent vinyl. **Be sure to spell check your text before sending

Name: Valentine’s Day Sweet Stash Box
Description: 8” x 5” Personalized Sweet Stash Box Filled to the brim with Valentine’s Day themed candy. These are personalized with a name & “sweet stash” boxes contain candy such as Reese’s Hearts, Sour Patch Hearts, Swedish Fish, Gummy Bears, Gummy Life Savors, Candy Bracelets, Conversation Hearts & Air Heads. Boxes are made to order and candy is stopped stored inside tiny ziplock bags when I package them to ensure the candy will still be fresh for Valentine’s Day.

Name: Personalized Teacher Gift Heart Card + Cuff Bangel

The Heart card is Personalized with the Teachers Name and grade level then signed with the students name. Choose from silver, gold or rose gold finish for the knot bangle.

Name: Bride’s Babes - Bridal Party T-Shirt
Description: These matching T-shirts would be cute for you and your bridesmaids to wear for your  bachelorette outings. The white T-shirt being for the bride, a special one for the maid of honor & as many as you need for the rest of your special ladies!

Name: #Momlife #Toddlerlife T-shirts
Description: These Mommy and me T-shirt were designed by me and they are the true definition of me and my daughter 😂So if you're a Millennial with a wild, miniature version of you running around and you're just trying to survive the day, these shirts were made for you! Price is Per shirt so be sure to add one in your size and one in toddler size.

Name: Bridesmaids Tote Bags
Description: These canvas tote bags are perfect gifts for your special ladies on your wedding day, fill the bags with a cute robe, slippers and a personalized tumbler! Each tote is personalized with your bridesmaids names and wedding roles in your choice of color.

Name: Personalized Bridesmaid Tumblers
Description: Acrylic Tumblers with lids and straws personalized with your bridesmaids names and Wedding roles in your choice of color.

Name: Mother of the Bride/Groom Tote Bags
Description: Perfect gift to give the Mother of the Bride & Groom at your Bridal shower so that they will have a special bag ready for your wedding day. Or you could gift them on the wedding day. There are also “Bride Tribe” & “petal petrol” bags that match for the rest of your brutal party.

Name: Bridesmaid Proposal // Thank You Gift Box
Description: These gift boxes can be  used as proposal boxes -OR- Thank You boxes for the Day of the wedding. 7”x5” Box is personalized with a name on top in the color of your choice, filled with matching crinkle paper, A Knot Hair Tie, a wine bottle tag (legally I am not allowed to sell alcohol so the bottle of wine itself is not include. Tag will come with ribbon for you to attach to a bottle of wine) & Tie the KNOT bangle attached to a personalized heart shaped card. You may choose to add extra gifts to this box with the last drop down menu (extra fees apply) Our KNOT bangles are adjustable & come in 3 different finishes to choose from, Silver, Gold or Rose Gold. The heart shaped chards are customizable. You can choose one of our short, sweet notes or you may choose to come up with your own short, sweet note.

Name: Bridesmaid Proposal // Thank You Box
Description: Personalized Gift Boxes can be used at Bridesmaid proposal boxes -or- Thank You Boxes for the day of your wedding. 7”x5” Personalized box, you choose the color of name on the front of box. Box includes personalized heart card, KNOT Bangle, Scrunchy & Diamond Pen. You may choose to add extra gifts to this box with the last drop down menu (extra fees will be added for each extra item) You may customize your heart card to say your own short note or choose from one of our pre-made sweet notes.Our Knot Bangles are adjustable and come in 3 different finishes:Silver, Gold & Rose Gold. Be sure to spell check all info that you add to text boxes as I will be copying and pasting most info.

Name: Dripping in Diamonds Tumbler
Description: Personalized Tumbler “dripping” in colorful diamonds and crystals and customized with the name of your choice. Tumbler comes with lid & straw.
